text: 10.12: Stt 19.24-28; Mt 10.15; 11.24Zisas mba bunin mbe nzuav khaŋ mbe nzuai, “Gu guigira nde nzuai, Fhe Bakɨme zumgum kha nuianan ki gumgi gu mbigi muuŋgi tɨvi mbatɨgi ga suaŋv mbe suanga tuk hɨgɨrga. Mba tɨvar nde muuŋgi ŋgun ki gumgi gu mbigi, mbe ndirga simtɨgi, nta guigira mba Sodoman kegi gumgi gu mbigi ndirga simtɨgi kambararga.”
